attributes.action: Raise the speed limit on the A610 between M1 J26 and Ikea back to 70 mph
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The reduced speed limit on this strectch of road from 70 mph to 40 and 50 mph is farcical. There are no pedestrians anywhere near this by-pass and the new speed limit is causing drivers to drive through Kimberly instead of taking the by-pass, therefore increasing the risk to all road users.
I believe that the limit should be raised back to the national speed limit.
